data.persona: I love baking cakes. I hate short notice for large orders. I have always wanted to be a cook.
data.description:
You are in the Bedroom.
The bedroom is simple and yet homey. There is a small wooden bed covered in a colorful homemade quilt. There is a small wooden cabinet for storing the second pair of clothing. A colorful homemade tapestry brightens a wall.
There's a straw mattress, a colorful homemade quilt, a second pair of clothing, a small wooden bed, an a cozy fur rug, a small table, a wall, a colorful homemade tapestry, an a wooden chair, and a small wooden cabinet here.
The town baker and the bedbug are here.

You are carrying a spice and a spoon, wearing a shoe and a ceremonial hat, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the colorful homemade quilt so I can give it to my wife.
data.mid_motivation: I have to work at the bakery today, and want my wife to be comfortable until I come home in the evening.
data.long_motivation: I want my wife to continue to be happy, so she'll agree to go on a vacation with me in a few weeks.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: give colorful homemade quilt to wife
